experience.title: Junior Actuarial Analyst
responsibilities: Perform quarterly valuation and reserve calculations for life insurance products using GGY AXIS.
Update mortality and lapse assumptions based on historical trend analysis and experience studies.
Develop automated reporting templates using VBA and SQL to reduce monthly data processing time by 20%.
Support senior actuaries in preparing financial projections and documentation for regulatory filings.

experience.title: Actuarial Intern
responsibilities: Assisted in the pricing of personal lines products by conducting competitive rate analysis and loss development modeling.
Utilized R and SQL to clean and validate large datasets for use in predictive modeling projects.
Collaborated with the underwriting team to identify key risk drivers in the personal auto portfolio.
Presented findings on regional loss trends to department leadership during the final internship capstone.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
